verses.verse: A Psalm <S%H4210><s%> of Asaph <S%H623><s%>. Truly 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> is good <S%H2896><s%> to Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>, even to such as are of a clean <S%H1249><s%> heart <S%H3824><s%>.

But as for me, my feet <S%H7272><s%> were almost <S%H4592><s%> gone <S%H5186><s%> <S%H8804><s%> <S%H8675><s%> <S%H5186><s%> <S%H8803><s%>; my steps <S%H838><s%> had well nigh <S%H369><s%> slipped <S%H8210><s%> <S%H8795><s%>.
For I was envious <S%H7065><s%> <S%H8765><s%> at the foolish <S%H1984><s%> <S%H8802><s%>, when I saw <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the prosperity <S%H7965><s%> of the wicked <S%H7563><s%>.
For there are no bands <S%H2784><s%> in their death <S%H4194><s%>: but their strength <S%H193><s%> is firm <S%H1277><s%>.
They are not in trouble <S%H5999><s%> as other men <S%H582><s%>; neither are they plagued <S%H5060><s%> <S%H8792><s%> like <S%H5973><s%> other men <S%H120><s%>.
Therefore pride <S%H1346><s%> compasseht them about as a chain <S%H6059><s%> <S%H8804><s%>; violence <S%H2555><s%> covereth <S%H5848><s%> <S%H8799><s%> them as a garment <S%H7897><s%>.
Their eyes <S%H5869><s%> stand out <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8804><s%> with fatness <S%H2459><s%>: they have more <S%H5674><s%> <S%H8804><s%> than heart <S%H3824><s%> could wish <S%H4906><s%>.

They are corrupt <S%H4167><s%> <S%H8686><s%>, and speak <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8762><s%> wickedly <S%H7451><s%> concerning oppression <S%H6233><s%>: they speak <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8762><s%> loftily <S%H4791><s%>.
They set <S%H8371><s%> <S%H8804><s%> their mouth <S%H6310><s%> against the heavens <S%H8064><s%>, and their tongue <S%H3956><s%> walketh <S%H1980><s%> <S%H8799><s%> through the earth <S%H776><s%>.

Therefore his people <S%H5971><s%> return <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8799><s%> <S%H8675><s%> <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8686><s%> hither <S%H1988><s%>: and waters <S%H4325><s%> of a full <S%H4392><s%> cup are wrung out <S%H4680><s%> <S%H8735><s%> to them.
And they say <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, How doth 'Elohim <S%H410><s%> know <S%H3045><s%> <S%H8804><s%>? and is there <S%H3426><s%> knowledge <S%H1844><s%> in Ha `Elyon <S%H5945><s%> ?
Behold, these are the ungodly <S%H7563><s%>, who prosper <S%H7961><s%> in the world <S%H5769><s%>; they increase <S%H7685><s%> <S%H8689><s%> in riches <S%H2428><s%>.
Verily I have cleansed <S%H2135><s%> <S%H8765><s%> my heart <S%H3824><s%> in vain <S%H7385><s%>, and washed <S%H7364><s%> <S%H8799><s%> my hands <S%H3709><s%> in innocency <S%H5356><s%>.
For all the day <S%H3117><s%> long have I been plagued <S%H5060><s%> <S%H8803><s%>, and chastened <S%H8433><s%> every morning <S%H1242><s%>.

If I say <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, I will speak <S%H5608><s%> <S%H8762><s%> thus <S%H3644><s%>; behold, I should offend <S%H898><s%> <S%H8804><s%> against the generation <S%H1755><s%> of thy children <S%H1121><s%>.
When I thought <S%H2803><s%> <S%H8762><s%> to know <S%H3045><s%> <S%H8800><s%> this, it was too painful <S%H5999><s%> for me <S%H5869><s%>;
Until I went <S%H935><s%> <S%H8799><s%> into the sanctuary <S%H4720><s%> of 'Elohim <S%H410><s%>; then understood <S%H995><s%> <S%H8799><s%> I their end <S%H319><s%>.
Surely thou didst set <S%H7896><s%> <S%H8799><s%> them in slippery places <S%H2513><s%>: thou castedst them down <S%H5307><s%> <S%H8689><s%> into destruction <S%H4876><s%>.
How are they brought into desolation <S%H8047><s%>, as in a moment <S%H7281><s%> ! they are utterly <S%H5486><s%> <S%H8804><s%> consumed <S%H8552><s%> <S%H8804><s%> with terrors <S%H1091><s%>.
As a dream <S%H2472><s%> when one awaketh <S%H6974><s%> <S%H8687><s%>; so, O YY <S%H136><s%>, when thou awakest <S%H5782><s%>, thou shalt despise <S%H959><s%> <S%H8799><s%> their image <S%H6754><s%>.
Thus my heart <S%H3824><s%> was grieved <S%H2556><s%> <S%H8691><s%>, and I was pricked <S%H8150><s%> <S%H8709><s%> in my reins <S%H3629><s%>.
So foolish <S%H1198><s%> was I, and ignorant <S%H3045><s%> <S%H8799><s%>: I was as a beast <S%H929><s%> before thee.
Nevertheless I am continually <S%H8548><s%> with thee: thou hast holden <S%H270><s%> <S%H8804><s%> me by my right <S%H3225><s%> hand <S%H3027><s%>.
Thou shalt guide <S%H5148><s%> <S%H8686><s%> me with thy counsel <S%H6098><s%>, and afterward <S%H310><s%> receive <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8799><s%> me to glory <S%H3519><s%>.
Whom have I in heaven <S%H8064><s%> but thee? and there is none upon earth <S%H776><s%> that I desire <S%H2654><s%> <S%H8804><s%> beside thee.

My flesh <S%H7607><s%> and my heart <S%H3824><s%> faileth <S%H3615><s%> <S%H8804><s%>: but 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> is the strength <S%H6697><s%> of my heart <S%H3824><s%>, and my portion <S%H2506><s%> for ever <S%H5769><s%>.

For, lo, they that are far <S%H7369><s%> from thee shall perish <S%H6><s%> <S%H8799><s%>: thou hast destroyed <S%H6789><s%> <S%H8689><s%> all them that go a whoring <S%H2181><s%> <S%H8802><s%> from thee.

But <S%H589><s%> it is good <S%H2896><s%> for me to draw near <S%H7132><s%> to 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>: I have put <S%H7896><s%> <S%H8804><s%> my trust <S%H4268><s%> in the YY <S%H136><s%> GOD <S%H3069><s%>, that I may declare <S%H5608><s%> <S%H8763><s%> all thy works <S%H4399><s%>.
